title.en: The Young Lady I Served Became a Young Master

altTitles.en: The Lady I Served Became a Master
The Lady I Served Has Become a Master

altTitles.uk: Леді, Якій Я Служила, Стала Господарем

altTitles.mn: Миний Үйлчилж Байсан Залуу Авхай, Залуу Ноёнтон Болсон нь

altTitles.ja: 仕えたお嬢様がお坊ちゃまになった

altTitles.th: คุณหนูที่เคยรับใช้กลายเป็นคุณชายไปซะแล้ว

altTitles.zh: 我服侍的小姐变成了少爷？

altTitles.id: Nona yang Kulayani Jadi Tuan Muda

altTitles.vi: Vị tiểu thư tôi từng theo hầu đã trở thành thiếu gia

description.de:
Als Sua eines Tages in der Welt ihres Lieblingsromans in der Rolle von Blair aufwacht, ist sie fest entschlossen, dem weiblichen Hauptcharakter Chloe zu helfen, die schwierigste Phase ihres Lebens zu überstehen. Seit Jahren wird Chloe diskriminiert und misshandelt, weil sie ein uneheliches Kind ist. Blair wird zu ihrem Dienstmädchen und zu ihrer Vertrauten und die zwei entwickeln eine besondere Freundschaft. Aber es stellt sich heraus, dass Chloe völlig anders ist, als im eigentlichen Roman dargestellt. Sie benutzt schwarze Magie, beauftragt Blair, ihr mysteriöse Tränke zu besorgen, und scheint keinerlei Interesse an den männlichen Hauptcharakteren zu haben. Dann erscheint eines Tages ein gut aussehender Mann vor Blairs Haustür, der Chloe zum Verwechseln ähnlich sieht. Könnte das ... die Lady sein, der sie gedient hat?! Alles scheint möglich, als die Geschichte von Liebe und Erlösung eine überraschende Wendung nach der anderen nimmt.

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52553678), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5440800), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107059249)

description.en:
It has been four years since the original heroine ended her life as a maid. A handsome man came to see her. He was a man who looked like the young lady that she used to serve.

"I'm here to keep my promise, Blair. You said that you'd be with me for the rest of your life."

"No way… Young Miss?"

At that moment, the man's crimson eyes turned to meet mine. He bent down till our noses nearly touched and kissed my hair.

And whispered — in a very sweet and beautiful voice —

"You have to call me Young Master now."

…Huh?

---
When Su-A wakes up inside the world of her favorite novel as the character of Blair, she is determined to help the female protagonist, Chloe, get through the darkest period of her life. 

For years, Chloe has had to endure discrimination and abuse for being an illegitimate child. Blair becomes her maid and confidante, and the two form a special friendship. But Chloe turns out to be quite a different character than the one described in the book. She wields black magic, sends Blair to fetch her mysterious potions, and seems totally uninterested in any of the male lead candidates. Then one day, a handsome man who looks an awful lot like Chloe shows up at Blair’s doorstep. Could it be…the lady she used to serve?! 

All bets are off as plot twist after plot twist unravels in this unpredictable tale of love and redemption.

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52553678), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5440800), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107059249)

description.fr:
Lorsque Sua se réveille soudain dans le monde de son roman préféré, dans le corps du personnage de Blair, elle est bien décidée à aider l’héroïne de l’histoire, Chloé, à surmonter la période la plus sombre de sa vie. Pendant des années, Chloé a dû endurer discrimination et abus, simplement parce qu’elle est une enfant illégitime. Blair devient alors sa servante et confidente, et une amitié toute particulière se forme. Mais voilà que Chloé s’avère être bien différente du personnage décrit dans le roman… Elle pratique la magie noire, envoie Blair chercher de mystérieuses potions, et semble totalement inintéressée par les personnages masculins qui l’entourent. Puis un beau jour, un charmant jeune homme ressemblant extrêmement à Chloé fait son apparition devant la porte de Blair. Se pourrait-il vraiment que ce soit… la demoiselle qu’elle servait? C’est ce qu’il reste à découvrir dans cette histoire d’amour et de rédemption pleine de retournements et d’imprévus!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52553678), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5440800), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107059249)

description.ru:
*Это не юри!*

Я не работала горничной уже 4 года. Но однажды у моего дома неожиданно появился красивый мужчина, очень похожий на леди, которой я когда-то служила.

-Я приехал, чтобы исполнить обещание. Ты говорила, что останешься со мной навсегда.

-Не может быть… Госпожа?

В этот момент его красные глаза слегка округлились. Он наклонил голову, поцеловал локон моих волос и нежно прошептал:

-Теперь зови меня "господин."

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52553678), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5440800), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107059249)

description.vi:
Khi tỉnh dậy trong thế giới của cuốn tiểu thuyết yêu thích với tư cách là Blair, nữ chính đã quyết tâm giúp Chloe, nữ chính nguyên tác vượt qua thời kỳ đen tối nhất trong cuộc đời cô. Chloe đã phải chịu sự kỳ thị và ngược đãi vì là con ngoài giá thú nhiều năm liền. Blair trở thành người giúp việc và người bạn tâm giao của cô, giữa hai người sau đó hình thành một tình bạn đặc biệt. Nhưng Chloe hóa ra là một nhân vật hoàn toàn khác so với những gì được mô tả trong cuốn sách. Cô ấy sử dụng ma thuật đen, cử Blair đi lấy những lọ thuốc bí ẩn. Ngoài ra, Chloe dường như hoàn toàn không quan tâm đến bất kỳ ứng cử viên nam chính nào. Đến một ngày, một người đàn ông đẹp trai trông rất giống Chloe xuất hiện trước cửa nhà Blair. Người đó… là cô tiểu thư Blair từng phục vụ đó sao?!

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52553678), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5440800), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107059249)

description.zh:
忠犬女仆X冷美人少爷，穿越到最爱的小说世界中，我要以女主身边侍女的身份重新生活！帮助我家小姐和男主过上幸福的生活。但这一切随着那件事的发生，一切戛然而止。就在那一天，我服侍的小姐竟然变成了少爷？！

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52553678), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5440800), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107059249)
